Name: Return Alive
About the game: The girl was alone among wild animals. Escaping with improvised means: lipstick and cosmetics, she must, by all means, get out and find her way home. Return Alive is a 2D shooter in which you need to help a girl survive. Defeat animals in an unequal battle and find a way out. A lot of bonuses that drop out of the baskets will help you with this. Dodge the boulders and defeat the lion king. Features of the game: - Interesting Pixel-Art - Arcade - Exciting music - Boss
